segments.text: I have to admit, those kids are pretty clever.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They've set up a whole system to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is using a plate, perhaps to collect the loot or as a decoy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is ready and waiting, a perfect accomplice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a genuine moment of childhood mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Even if it's a bit risky with that stool, their teamwork is impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so invested in their mission, it's really quite charming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman remains completely oblivious to their secret operations.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is the kind of memory they'll probably laugh about later.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don't fall, but I admire their spirit.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a pure, unadulterated joy to watch children be so enterprising.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This small act of rebellion is quite endearing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely going to enjoy those forbidden treats.
segments.speaker: PAR
